alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 12:24PM EDT until April 04 at 4:24AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .Recent heavy rain is resulting in rises on the Ohio River. The river is forecast to rise above flood stage for portions of the Lower Ohio including Olmsted and Cairo. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO TUESDAY, APRIL 04... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...From late Monday night to Tuesday, April 04. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 34.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 44.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday, April 03. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
